column3:
It'd be nice to update the [`doc/files.md`](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/files.md) as well:

https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/2b45cf0bcdb3d2c1de46899e30885c953b57b475/src/index/coinstatsindex.cpp#L100
test/functional/rpc_blockchain.py:        # muhash should not be included in gettxoutset unless requested.\n
This is wrong. Indexes are compatible with pruning, if done right.
(same mistake in the test, that can be fixed as well)

If I understand correctly, @fjahr is working on that but for the moment it isn't the case yet

src/init.cpp#L403
```cpp
    argsman.AddArg("-prune=<n>", strprintf("Reduce storage requirements by enabling pruning (deleting) of old blocks. This allows the pruneblockchain RPC to be called to delete specific blocks, and enables automatic pruning of old blocks if a target size in MiB is provide
I presumed that #15946 changed this for all index types, but maybe I am mistaken.

In principle it seems it should be doable: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19521/#discussion_r603607663 (not sure this GitHub link is working so provided in code markdown too)\n\n`https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19521/#discussion_r603607663`
